long_description: Your home yoga sanctuary, the Manduko Pro Squared Yoga Mat offers luxurious density for unparalleled comfort and cushioning, along with a superior nonslip fabric-like finish. Nearly 40 square feet of space for up to 2 to practice. Zero-waste, sustainable yoga mat is made with Oeko-Tex certified, emissions-free manufacturing. Slip resistant, yet non-sticky, even when wet from light perspiration. Superior wear and longevity. The Manduko Pro Squared Yoga Mat is 100% latex-free, perfect for people with latex sensitivities.
short_description: Your home yoga sanctuary, the Manduko Pro Squared Yoga Mat offers luxurious density for unparalleled comfort and cushioning, along with a superior nonslip fabric-like finish.
